name: CbcGeneral
brief: Abstract base for general multi-way branching

algorithms.name:
Abstract Base for Multi-Way/Lookahead Branching
Copyright (C) 2002, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcGeneral: Abstract base class for advanced branching strategies
that create lists of subproblems beyond simple two-way branching.

Designed for:
- Partial evaluation (lookahead) branching
- Multi-way branching strategies
- Complex branching objects that need customized subproblem generation

Pure virtual class - see CbcGeneralDepth for main implementation.

see:
CbcNWay for simpler N-way branching

Edwin 11/10/2009 carved out of CbcBranchActual
